website_summaries.verdict: One of the best highway-specific and value tires for small and large trucks that need better performance.
pros: Tight lug spacing helps to reduce rolling resistance
Increases fuel efficiency and overall performance for larger trucks
Tread design breaks up loose terrain and road debris for better traction
cons: Tires do not perform well when pulling heavy loads and trailers

customer_reviews.title: beware ... not the same Goodyear Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: I replaced one of the 235 / 75R15 Goodyear Wrangler tires on my Dodge Ram van that I use for towing my boat... I always kept these at 40+ PSI to safely handle the towing loads. The new tire... the SAME Goodyear Wrangler is now a light duty tire capable of 35 PSI max pressure.. I am now afraid to tow my boat with this setup. Beware.... the new Goodyear Wranglers are cheap light duty tires compared to the old 44 PSI max pressure tires. I wanted the new tire to "match" the existing tires. I am now stuck with having to replace a brand new tire.
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good tire
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a good tire. Put them on my plow truck, a Ranger, and tested them a few days later when we had a 10 inch storm. I pushed the snow about half way through the storm and had great traction, MUCH better than the old m&s that were on them. Had a couple of times yhey got me out when I know for s fact that I would have been stuck with my old tires. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: TommyD

customer_reviews.title: Wears down too fast!! great price but I see why.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the name brand.....However the tires I have had for a year on my truck and have only put 11,000 miles on them and they look like I only have about 5k left of wear before danger zone. All my tires in the past from a variety of manufacturers have all lasted a lot longer on the wear. My truck is a work truck and I drive it like a grandma, so there is no excuse for the excessive wear existing currently.
customer_reviews.author: Draincrusher

customer_reviews.title: Beefier than the stock tires better looking too
customer_reviews.text: These P235/75R15 Goodyear wrangler radial tires fit my ford ranger xlt perfect. Beefier than the tiny stock tires it came with and better looking too. These tire ride smooth with no noticeable noise on the road because of the bigger tire treads. I’m happy with my purchase so far zero complaints. If your looking for this size tires at an affordable price, Goodyear is a trusted USA made brand. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, average quality tire.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good all purpose tire. Not great at anything, but good at everything. Traction and tread wear are okay. They have an UTQG of 300AB which is actually quite poor. The UTQG assigns a number (100-700) for tread wear, and two letter designations (AA, A, B, C) for traction and temperature rating. I typically recommend tires with at least a 400aa rating. However, I needed to match a customer's existing tires, so these fit the bill. They mount and balance well. Customer is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M

customer_reviews.title: They are a great all around tire and perform well in all weather ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these same tires on my 1995 Ford F 150 4X4 since it was new and have never had a problem with them! They are a great all around tire and perform well in all weather and terrain. You can get better tires for mud and snow or better weight capacity but then you give up something else! With the Wrangler you get it all, decent mud, snow traction and hauling capacity with good fuel mileage and tire life! .As long as Goodyear keeps makin'em I'll keep buyin'em!
customer_reviews.author: David Roadman

customer_reviews.title: it gets stuck really easy. These tires help so much on the slippery ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are a drastic improvement if you need to take you truck off road occasionally. My 2WD Ranger is used to haul dirt bikes, and with an open differential, it gets stuck really easy. These tires help so much on the slippery and muddy dirt roads you need to travel to get to parking areas at OHV riding areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They feel amazing and have very great trend on the tire
customer_reviews.text: I just barely got them fitted. They feel amazing and have very great tread on the tire. Arrived on time or just before the deadline and so far it's been good. My rim is a little dirty but the tires are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Toaster

customer_reviews.title: Superior Goodyear Wrangler tires
customer_reviews.text: A price you can't beat. Make sure they are not manufactured more than 2 years prior. Ask the merchant. I have used these Goodyear Wrangler tires on my 1999 Jeep Wrangler Sahara since new with 3 exceptions that I regretted soon after. These tires are great for typical city and highway use. If you want an offroad tire they don't have deep lugs for wet soil or sand grip. These tires are for all-around conditions and not for extreme conditions. They ride smooth and get decent mileage. After 20 years I have learned they are superior tires for both wet and dry conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Ambergris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased numerous sets of this particular tire for my company trucks and I feel they are just as good as any quality tire out there. I maintain air pressure on a weekly basis and front end alignment every 12000 miles, This is what gives us the maximum miles possible out of this inexpensive tire. Even the best tires will not reach its rated mileage if not maintained regularly.
customer_reviews.author: jay ponce

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal for my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: These tires will probably need replacing before tread is worn down. Unless you do super heavy long driving, expect them to last 6-8 years before they start weathering and cracking. They have a little more road noise than others, but hey, it's a jeep, not a luxury sedan. Expect them to cost you about $15 each to be mounted at a Wal-Mart. Call ahead and make sure they will mount tires bought elsewhere. Some will, some won't. But I can nearly guarantee that even with this fee, you will have saved at least 20% what they would have charged you if you bought them there. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Great price good tread pattern. Has a little sidewall flex at speedy turns. Sprays a bit of mud/moisture in wet conditions. Would buy again (and I can buy tires through work!)
customer_reviews.author: Eli H.

customer_reviews.title: 30k Miles
customer_reviews.text: Had these on my Jeep Cherokee 235/75/R15. Incredibly soft tire. Wasn't expecting excellent tires but these only lasted me 30,000 and the last 5,000 were questionable. They gripped great for the first winter I had them but after that might as well have had racing slicks on it. Not a bad tire if you need one in a pinch but for an extra $50 you can get tires that will last 50% longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam the Stallion

customer_reviews.title: Scam!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Scam !!!!! The tires came years expired ! That’s why it’s so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: nicole mirete

customer_reviews.title: Tires should be warranty replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Tires have less than 5k miles and they are now out of round, only one of four will rebalance. Very disappointed, now must live with a vibration or buy another tire.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Goodknight

customer_reviews.title: Blow out!
customer_reviews.text: Had these tires on the vehicle 1 month and had a sidewall blow out.
customer_reviews.author: Kachemak

customer_reviews.title: great tires
customer_reviews.text: great tires for the price about $30 less that in my area. I had it mounted and balanced for $10 a tire
customer_reviews.author: big ok

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great tread for amazing deal. Keeping this on my wish list for another buy when needed. Blue paint on the lettering still on tires after a couple months.. Doesnt seem to be going away. But not a big deal. Can always put the blue paint lettering on inner side of vehicle. I get told a lot that the tires look great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn kulhanek

customer_reviews.title: Classic styling
customer_reviews.text: Classic design, Outlined white lettering and time tested tread pattern is what is so great about these tires. These are true all terrain tires. You will get good traction in all weather conditions, including snow. You can go on packed muddy roads with confidence. Driving in deep mud is not a strong point. These are for my classic 1975 Ford Pick-up truck. The ride is nice and the handling on the street is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Deere

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2001 Jeep Cherokee. They're meaty and ride nice. I don't notice much road noise. Would buy again. have put about 1000 miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: IT'S SARAH DAMMIT

customer_reviews.title: Good light truck tire
customer_reviews.text: Good grip, low road noise and nice ride. Perfect for lower gvw 1/2 ton trucks. Tread wear rating is low but thats the trade off for higher grip. Id recommend them unless youre planning on adding air bags or heavier springs on your truck to up youre payload, then you probably want to pick something with a higher weight rating. But for light duty use these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Winn

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that I had to purchase a replacement tire 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the handling of these tires these last winter purchases 4 tires in December of 2017, I was disappointed that I had to purchase a replacement tire 7 months later due to a side wall blow out. Tire appeared to have a side wall defect, at 45 mph the tire completely shredded the side wall before I was able to get stopped, upper side wall just before it meets the tread was less then 1\8 of inch thick while other areas around that same circumference were all most a 1\4 of an inch thick. Bad molding.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Seem good so far! Like how they look on my Jeep.
customer_reviews.text: Only had these for 3 months, but I have made 2 road trips of about 750 miles round trip at high speeds (75+). So far so good , no problems. They are Mud and Snow and they look good on my 2000 Jeep Cherokee.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ghigo

customer_reviews.title: Over all great all around tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my 04 Chevy tracker zr2.. Nice ride. Great traction in rain and snow..and dry roads. Pretty good on some light off roading.. Not noisy. Running with 32psi. Comfortable ride ok handleing at highway speeds.. Great around town.. Would probably handle better with higher psi..
customer_reviews.author: foot

customer_reviews.title: Good Tire from Good Year
customer_reviews.text: Only needed 1 Tire and Amazon had it. Very Happy to be able to replace my side wall cut tire (Curb Cut) with a new one. Can't comment much about Mileage Life or Longevity, only had it for a few weeks now. My other 3 tires are showing wear after a few years. It's a low mileage tire as you should know.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Best tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Personally I think they are the best tire for the money. They aren't terrible expensive but they do good on many surfaces and they last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 7-4-2016 -45 k miles  * 9-14-19
customer_reviews.text: last set bought are still on close to 50 k miles, **9-14-19 just bought two more After one month 3 weeks mount es have to re air weekly will notaintain 35-30 psi
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Everything you would want a great tire to be
customer_reviews.text: It is tough and doesn't make a ton of noise going down the road. The wet or dry traction is excellent. The looks are very nice. I am very happy with these tires and love to tell people about them and where I bought them and how I got them installed!
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer tire.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of the 235/75/15s for replacement tires for a utility trailer that I lifted and use for hauling a UTV into the mountains. Wanted a taller tire with beefier tread for the sharp rocks. Had the local tire place mount these and didn't even balance them. They ride nice and look awesome. So much more durable and appropriate than the stock tires.
customer_reviews.author: Travis T.

customer_reviews.title: Great grip for an all terrain
customer_reviews.text: These tires when i called the local tire shop are running $110 a tire, i got them on sale on amazon for half that. I have them on my ford explorer, they are very smooth running tires down the highway, and have had to get through some mud with them, they do pretty well for an all terrain, they do amazing on snow and ice. i will most likely buy these again when i wear out the current set on my suv.
customer_reviews.author: Lance D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: So far great Tires. They look rugged and very nice on the car. Ride quality has improved over the the previous ones I've had, so quiet and balanced comfortable ride, for the money it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Wrangler not just for jeeps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tire for the rear end of my truck, because it's 2wd and a stick. These tires really dig into the snow. Especially if you live where they don't plow back streets. It's great to have a tire going up hill to get you home.
customer_reviews.author: jon beams

customer_reviews.title: Great tires.
customer_reviews.text: 97 Chevy 2wd. Good traction. Smooth ride. Drove some farm roads and across fields while hunting and these tires are working great. I get a good ride on paved roads too.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Who ever thought ordering tires from Amazon was a good idea? I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Who ever thought ordering tires from Amazon was a good idea? I am glad I did! My tire guy said these are as good as the tires that are twice the price on his shelf (don't tell his boss). Next time I need tires I am coming here!
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the price and good quality. I ordered these for my 1995 Jeep Wrangler. They are fairly quiet on the highway even driving with the soft top on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have had them for only 3 months so i cant coment on the longevity of the tire. Has very good traction and a pretty smoth ride for a tire that can be used off road.
customer_reviews.author: P. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my Mazda B3000 and not only do they look great, but they ride nice too. I’ve been using this tire for years and I’m happy with it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Tire looks good on my ZJ and was priced very well. Rides good and doesn’t have any noise. You’ll get good traction off road but the tire is kinda soft so I wouldn’t recommend any serious off reading in it. Overall I’m happy with my purchase and have about 10-15k on them now and they’re still doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great looking.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tires for my truck. A price my local tire shop couldn't beat. They're holding up well and I will definitely shop for tires using Amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: jes

customer_reviews.title: Worst tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: These tires suck. They might be OK on a trailer. I put them on my explorer and I can feel every piece if gravel in the road and they will hydroplane badly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value! High mileage
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 years, but they could have lasted longer. They hot damage because I neglected the front end suspension maintenance. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ELVIN REYES

customer_reviews.title: Very good general use tire.....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all round use tire. I have had many sets of these exact tires over the years, and I am always impressed with the excellent handling, traction, and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires good price
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these tires, and they fit really well on my 2000 chevy blazer, but 5 days after putting these tires on my girlfriend wrecked my blazer lol
customer_reviews.author: westun harvey

customer_reviews.title: GOOD value
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick. Just had them mounted for a couple of weeks. But, they look good and ride great. Would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Oleham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these .paid less then I normally pay and way better quality of tire here. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Check over new products before proceeding any further
customer_reviews.text: I order 4 new tires but 2 of them were defective and I didn’t notice until I was washing the blue off the white lettering. The company that put the new ones on didn’t notice defect. It cost me $160.00 to have the 4 put on. Now I have to pay $80.00 to have the 2 replacements put on. Not such a good like I thought I had plus I have to go thru the hassle of returning the 2 defective tires. But I do want them to see the defects.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Salwei

customer_reviews.title: Great value good tire
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in my ‘84 F150 XL. They are a simple 2 ply tire, but for the value they are extremely worth it. Arrived via UPS in Alaska in just 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Witman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking tires for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Best LOOKING tires for the price range. This is my second set. A little hum on the expressway if you have the window down. Ride is smooth for a Jeep. Don’t last long though.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaJoe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on our Dodge Durango. Brand new. No problems at all. This is the 3rd tire we bought from Amazon. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Supastar808

customer_reviews.title: Very good handling in the snow
customer_reviews.text: Had over 2' of snow fall over Southeast Alaska an these tires did amazing with 4 wheel drive.
customer_reviews.author: L dog

customer_reviews.title: Goodyear Wrangler Radials
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my 1955 Chevy 3100 and they track wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Nice passenger car tire
customer_reviews.text: They charge a tire disposal fee to buy here then you pay the fee again when you get rid of your old tires.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Not good tires already dry rotted after only two years will leave you stranded on the side of the road
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around tire
customer_reviews.text: Second set purchased great price. Handles Mud , Rain, Snow & still low road noise
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Mounted and balanced without issue. Perfect metric replacement for original tires on 79 f150.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F

customer_reviews.title: Usa
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire but $20 increase in price less than 3 weeks sucked
customer_reviews.author: joe m stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: On my second set. Great tire for the money. long lasting and rides good.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.text: Had these shipped to and installed at Sears, all set.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: beefy tread !!
customer_reviews.text: this is about the third set of these tires i purchased. beefy tread. good value, if on a budget. keep them properly inflated. rotate as needed. tread wears well on highway/city.
customer_reviews.author: az

customer_reviews.title: Three hundred dollars delivered to my house ! Great price !
customer_reviews.text: Good tires great price. 75.00 each shipped to my house
customer_reviews.author: Emptysky1

customer_reviews.title: SImply great tires!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my BFG AT's with this purchase. Smoother ride and much quieter. I've been using BFG's for about 30 years, but no more ;)
customer_reviews.author: MPS116

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: We bought a 4 piece set for our beautiful classic 1995 Jeep Wrangler. Pretty sure it's getting better mileage since we took off the over sized tires. I KNOW the ride and drive are better for certain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery Great price Excellent product, looks good!!! This tire is a winner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I think the other three tires are still quite okay but I was given one bad tire.
customer_reviews.text: These tires did me well the first two years but dangerous after that. I was on the interstate last Friday and one of the tires just blew out on me. Thank God, He is looking out for me, no accidents and I don't have any evidence of any minor such as soft tissue injuries. I think the other three tires are still quite okay but I was given one bad tire.
customer_reviews.author: Jorel S.

customer_reviews.title: One of the four tires has a slight wobble/defect.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get a chance to use these right away and found one tire had a slight defect and seems to cause a vibration at highway speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Broda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent in the snow and ice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent in the snow and ice. It says it doesn't fit a Ford Explorer but it definitely does. It seems to be wearing fine and doesn't make much road noise.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: great ride
customer_reviews.text: glad to be back to using these tires, great ride and low road noise. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joe Paz

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire
customer_reviews.text: Used on a 79 cj7. Fit great and balanced up well on a 15x8 wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: Another lesson in getting what you pay for.....:( Flat in the first 10 miles. May have been a mistake and they used gummi bears and cotton candy instead of rubber during production process.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 new tires last year in July, lightly used; right now they got deformed, because of the tire design. Also, they produce a lot of noise and at 65MPH they begin to shake. Unbelievably, that something like that happens to a recognized brand like Good year
customer_reviews.author: sucel Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.  A+
customer_reviews.text: Obviously one of the top marks. Long lasting. Good value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Bran

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tire
customer_reviews.text: These are some of my favorite tires I have owned just well rounded tires! Price, Duribilty, Traction.
customer_reviews.author: Dallen Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: This is about the third or fourth set of these that I’ve used the price and performance is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow . What a deal at Christmas .. still have not put them on . But for the deal I got . Could not pass them up
customer_reviews.author: greg b.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Sweet tire excellent price. Unstoppable in the snow. No one believed me when I said how much I paid. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton

customer_reviews.title: Wet and dry traction are good. Good price too
customer_reviews.text: Put 4 of them on my dad's Jeep Wrangler. Its a daily driver. Wet and dry traction are good. Good price too. Didn't take much weight to balance out at the tire shop. Probably going to buy some for my Cherokee.
customer_reviews.author: AKmarksman

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: i had them before and i use them again, really good tires
customer_reviews.author: Mordor Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Save quite a bit on these to have installed.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. I just needed a matching single due ...
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. I just needed a matching single due to a flat. Tread matched perfect. As my local tire shop installed for about $15 it costs under $100 Plus it shipped free with my Prime! Thanx E.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Y.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: best tires for buck i have found been running them for years
customer_reviews.author: max phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good looking!
customer_reviews.text: These tires look great on my Ford Ranger. And the tread looks like it will be great for traction on slippery conditions. Delivery was fast (considering where they had to ship to me)
customer_reviews.author: Jewelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: These tires wotk and look perfect.... Update: Still working perfect getting ready to order for the front tires

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tires. Does great in snow, dont even use snow tires any more.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great tire.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say....?? Turns out to be a great tire at a great price! --and to top it all off, I think it makes my Explorer look extra sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: tires were very easy to balance and do a good job in the snow- they did not look as big as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: tedpierce

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of them they lasted about 2000 miles before the sidewall started popping out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price hike
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Great tires. Problem went to order 2 more and they went by#$ 24 ?????
customer_reviews.author: smurfmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to last me until I purchase all terrain ...
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price. Good enough to last me until I purchase all terrain off roaders, got me over 5,000 miles with no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, soft tire.
customer_reviews.text: New tires, cheap, will last if taken care of, soft side walls. Bottom dollar good year tire.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great tires Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. Look good on my blazer. Bought 4 great tread!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Luther

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Tires for 99 Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fine on Original Stock Jeep Wrangler Stock tires. Came in 1 day after Ordering on Amazon. These are Fantastic Value and appreciate the Deal Amazon had on these. You will not be disappointed as these Tires are hard to find at some tire places but were easily found on Amazon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Thick treads and seems to run good so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mamaradlo

customer_reviews.title: Working great on my wife's Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: Working great on my wife's Jeep Wrangler. Right now she is putting mostly highway miles on it. Holding up good and they are quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Rino

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great trade for snow. I’ve been putting these tires on my jeep for years. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought four Goodyear Wrangler from them. One had a hole in the sidewall and it wouldn't hold air. Customer service was very pleasant to deal with an they made everything right, what more can ya ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest price I could find and delivered to my door. So awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Your name (victim)

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong, hard to beat Goodyear.
customer_reviews.author: heresthedeal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Same tire I've been using on my Jimmy for years. No complaint. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A perfect tire for my 4x . Quiet, great traction in mud and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I am very very pleased with the availability of a US Brand name tire at the reasonable cost I paid. Not only that but the cost to have sears install it was below their usual rate. This is an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: Goodyear Wrangler Radial Tire - 235/75R15 105S
product_meta.description: An economic design for trucks in all weather conditions, the Wrangler Radial pickup tire from Goodyear offers an aggressive tread design that tackles wet, dry and icy conditions. The large tread blocks on Wrangler tires help ensure handling and control in a variety of conditions while the innovative anti-hydroplane technology sheds water from the tread area. Durable, reinforced rubber compounds ensure Wrangler tires resist damages from common sources. As one of the most trusted names in the tire business, Goodyear Tires has an ongoing legacy of success and a reputation for quality tires and satisfied drivers.
